page.text: de Vence MAGAZINE GUIDE TO VENCE Services QUICKGUIDE

Introduction Naturally every kind of services exists in Vence, so we have limited ourselves somewhat... If you are in need for any service ask a local, he or she will be more than willing to help you out. This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment. To download the newest version of our Magazine click on this icon. Services QUICKGUIDE Click here to return to Vence Magazine

Tuesday: 10h-12h30/17h-18h30, Wed: 9h30-12h30/ 14h30-18h30, Thur: 10h-12h30, Fri: 10h-12h30/ 15h30-18h30, Sat: 10h-12h30/14h30-18h30 Y’a un Croco dans l’Atelier ‘Y’a un Croco dans l’Atelier’, a shop and a workshop in one. Once inside, we will show you our favorite old fashion and design crafts. Ann and Eva will be delighted to initiate kids and adults with manual activities. We also organize bithday parties ! 2, rue du Marché - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 09 51 39 12 86 E-Mail: info@yauncrocodanslatelier.com www. yauncrocodanslatelier.com Adresse 8 Rue du Marché 06140 Vence, France

09h00-12h30/14h00-19h00. Sunday closed. Papeterie Multi-Services 140 Vence, France - Google Maps Adresse 12 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France 9/17/13 7:14 AM Come in to discover our vast range of products from stationary to ink cartridges at the best prices. Our services include: photocopying, fax, stamps, visiting cards, digital photos in 11 seconds... 11, ave Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 51 77 Email: papeterie.multiservices@yahoo.fr www.aux-plaisirs-decrire.com

The first shop to sell electronic cigarettes in Vence. There you’ll find all the flavours on sale on the French mar- ket as well as all the accessories available. Fernando and Magali will welcome you and explain all the subtleties of ‘vapotage’. 16, ave Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 92 04 65 96 www.azurvap.com 12 Avenue Marcellin Maurel, 06140 Vence, France - Google Maps 10h00-19h00. Sunday closed. Azur Vap Adresse 12 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France

09h00-12h00/15h00-18h00. Saturday and Sunday closed. Transports Longué France - Google Maps Adresse 128 Avenue des Poilus 06140 Vence, France 10/28/13 2:30 PM We are a family owned independant company. We do local and international delivery of large household goods or small packages. Storage facilities available. 128 ave des Poilus - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 58 09 20 Fax: 04 93 58 70 00 E-Mail: transports.longue@orange.fr www.transports-longue.com
134 ave Emile Hugues - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 59 06 70 Fax: 04 93 59 24 63 E-Mail: caron.elec@wanadoo.fr Caron Adresse 134 Avenue Emile Hugues 06140 Vence, France

09h00-12h00/14h00-18h00. Saturday and Sunday closed. Florida Stores Adresse 25 Avenue Marcellin Maurel 06140 Vence, France Situated in town center, an experienced team welcomes you to help you choose your shades, roller blinds, carpentry. Personalized studies of your home projects. 21, ave Marcelin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: 04 93 24 07 60 E-Mail: floridastores@orange.fr www.florida-store06.com

All about the icons Shopping No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. Hotels and Other Accomodation If you are searching for superior comfort or a budget “bed and breakfast” you will find an accomodation to suit you here. Restaurants FASHION HOTELS SOUVENIRS DELICATESSEN GUEST HOUSES CAMPING Vence’s restaurants cater for every taste and pocket - from inexpensive “plat du jour” of local produce to exotic flavours from other lands or gourmet adventures. Cafes Vence’s many cafes are ideal places to relax and watch the world go by, to meet and chat to residents or other tourists, or plan your next excursion. Real Estate Agents See how real people live on the Côte d’Azur by visiting sales properties with a choice of Real Estate Agents. Perhaps your visit will prove a good financial investment. Services Banks, pharmacies, and if you can’t find what you’re looking for, it is probably listed here. Galleries SERVICES FINANCE TAKE-AWAY The “City of Arts” is home to many galleries. Each has its own theme, special artist or style of work. Some are hidden in interesting untravelled corners of the city. Beauty Whether tempted to try a new look or merely smartening up for a special evening out, Vence’s beauty parlours and hairdressers are at your service. Places Museums, Parks, Miscellaneous sites worth seeing...

Introduction Naturally every kind of services exists in Vence, so we have limited ourselves to banks and pharmacies plus a few others... If you are in need for any service ask a local, he or she will be more than willing to help you out. This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment.
